page.title: 15Dangers for the Future.
page.content: Operations likely to damage the features of special interest at Tentsmuir Nature Reserve. 1. Cultavation 2. Introd. of grazing. 3. Cutting the 4. Application of vegetation. manures. 5. Application 6. Dumping of any of Pesticides. materials. 8. Release into site of any wild animal plant or seeds. 9. Killing or removal of any animal. 10.Destruction or removal of any plant or plant remains. 11.Change in woodland management. 12.Drainage and modification of the water courses, infilling of ditches.
